description:
60 Attack Damage
18 Lethality
15 Ability Haste

Nightstalker
After being unseen by enemies briefly, your next attack against a champion deals an additional true damage.

Blackout
When you are near enemy Stealth Wards and traps, reveal them briefly. While revealing wards, your attacks deal bonus damage to them.
name: Umbral Glaive
plaintext: Provides trap and ward detection periodically
